WorkItem.Description:
When I run the optimizer (on any character, tried different settings) it runs to 100% and when it is about to show the results it crashes with an unhandled exception.
 
Steps to Reproduce: 
Launch Rawr 
Import/load character
Run the optimizer and accept defaults
Wait for it to reach 100%
Observe that the Optimizer Crashes
 
Additional Information: 
Rawr v2.3.0
Happens on 2 different computers, Windows XP 32bit SP3, Windows Vista Ultimate 64 bit both fully updated.
 
Also, I can choose Continue on this error, close the Optimizer screen (which appears to be hanging) by clicking Cancel and Rawr will still be available.
 
The attached file contains the complete details from the .NET Framework error screen.

Comments.Message: I forgot to mention that every previous version of Rawr worked flawlessly on both PC's.
